title: Scheduled Maintenance - September 7, 2023
content: We are currently performing a scheduled maintenance on Thursday, September 7, 2023 at 7:00 AM PDT (10:00 AM EDT / 4:00 PM CEST / 12:00 AM AEST Sep. 8)

title: Cash Shop Update for September 6
content: Gachapon Update, Autumn Surprise Style Box, Autumn Permanent Equips, and more!

title: World's Best Punch King
content: It's time to see who's the best! Give it your all in World's Best Punch King!

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Maintenance - September 1, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 4 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.
